kv2.1:5.3: Atthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
kv2.1:6.1: Natthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
kv2.1:6.3: Hañci natthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:7.1: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, atthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
kv2.1:7.3: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, atthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ … pe …
kv2.1:8.1: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, natthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ … pe …
kv2.1:8.5: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, natthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ … pe …
kv2.1:9.4: Handa hi mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti.
kv2.1:10.1: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:11.3: Hañci natthi mārakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:12.1: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:12.3: Mārakāyikā devatā attano asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, aññesaṃ asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:13.1: Mārakāyikā devatā neva attano na aññesaṃ na tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:13.3: Hañci mārakāyikā devatā neva attano na aññesaṃ na tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:14.1: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:15.1: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?
kv2.1:16.3: Atthi arahato satthari vimati, dhamme vimati, saṃghe vimati, sikkhāya vimati, pubbante vimati, aparante vimati, pubbantāparante vimati, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?
kv2.1:17.1: Natthi arahato satthari vimati, dhamme vimati, saṃghe vimati, sikkhāya vimati, pubbante vimati, aparante vimati, pubbantāparante vimati, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?
kv2.1:17.3: Hañci natthi arahato satthari vimati … pe …
kv2.1:17.5: idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:18.1: Atthi puthujjanassa vimati, atthi tassa satthari vimati … pe …
kv2.1:18.5: Atthi arahato vimati, atthi tassa satthari vimati … pe …
kv2.1:19.1: Atthi arahato vimati, natthi tassa satthari vimati … pe …
kv2.1:19.5: Atthi puthujjanassa vimati, natthi tassa satthari vimati … pe …
kv2.1:20.7: Ye keci asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, sabbesaṃyeva atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:21.1: Ye keci asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, sabbesaṃyeva atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:21.3: Dārakā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi dārakānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:22.1: Paṇḍakā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi paṇḍakānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:23.1: Devā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi devatānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:25.1: Arahato uccārapassāvo asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, atthi tassa āsayoti?
kv2.1:25.3: Arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, atthi tassa āsayoti?
kv2.1:26.1: Arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, natthi tassa āsayoti?
kv2.1:26.3: Arahato uccārapassāvo asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, natthi tassa āsayoti?
kv2.1:27.3: Arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?
kv2.1:28.1: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, puthujjano methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?
kv2.1:28.3: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?
kv2.1:29.1: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, na ca arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?
kv2.1:29.3: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, na ca puthujjano methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?
kv2.1:30.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.1:30.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:31.13: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?
kv2.1:31.15: Hañci arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:32.5: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:33.3: Nanu arahato rāgappahānāya satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā … pe …
kv2.1:33.12: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:34.11: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:35.3: Nanu arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatanti?
kv2.1:35.5: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo … pe …
kv2.1:35.7: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:36.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti.
kv2.1:38.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:38.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:39.5: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:39.7: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:40.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv2.1:40.11: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:40.13: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:41.1: Sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.1:41.3: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:41.5: Paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.1:41.7: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:42.1: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:42.3: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:43.5: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:43.7: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:44.1: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv2.1:44.11: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:44.13: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:45.1: Paradhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.1:45.3: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:45.5: Sadhammakusalo arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv2.1:45.7: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
kv2.1:46.4: “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puthujjanā sīlasampannā satā sampajānā niddaṃ okkamanti, tesaṃ asuci na muccati.
kv2.1:46.5: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bāhirakā isayo kāmesu vītarāgā, tesampi asuci na muccati.
kv2.1:46.6: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ arahato asuci mucceyyā”ti.
kv2.1:47.6: Hañci arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ pare upasaṃhareyyuṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.1:48.1: Arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ pare upasaṃhareyyunti, atthi arahato parūpahāroti?
kv2.1:48.3: Arahato sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā pare upasaṃhareyyunti?
